[vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_image=”717″ bg_position=”center center” bg_repeat=”no-repeat” full_height=”yes” bg_color=”#000000″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”light” text_align=”center” bottom_padding=”0″ overlay_strength=”0.3″][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ top_margin=”-46″ column_shadow=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1578443119818{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;}” max_width=”880″]

Temporary Spur
Stent System

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]INVESTIGATIONAL USE ONLY
©2022 REFLOW MEDICAL, INC[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_image=”146″ bg_position=”center top” bg_repeat=”no-repeat” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”center” top_padding=”120″ bottom_padding=”60″ overlay_strength=”0.3″][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1578520613616{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

View a video demonstration of the spur

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn” max_width=”680″]The Temporary Spur Stent System is a novel combination device consisting of a patented retrievable stent system having a series of radially expandable spikes designed to create multiple pathways to deliver antiproliferative drugs for increased uptake into the vessel wall and facilitate acute luminal gain, without leaving anything behind[/vc_column_text]
[vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ width=”1/4″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-bottom” column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ width=”1/2″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” delay=”300″][nectar_video_lightbox link_style=”play_button_2″ nectar_play_button_color=”Default-Accent-Color” image_url=”705″ hover_effect=”defaut” box_shadow=”medium_depth” video_url=”https://vimeo.com/359104777″][vc_column_text]Caution:  Exclusively for OUS clinical investigations  (NCT03807531 and NCT04162418).  To be used by qualified investigators only.  Not available for commercial use until validly CE marked.  This device is not available in the United States.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ width=”1/4″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ width=”1/1″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ image_url=”52″ alignment=”center” animation=”None” img_link_large=”” img_link_target=”_self” box_shadow=”none” max_width=”100{17998daf1ff241809f3872829ebbf0ac6062443c2cf2a6ce3d855ed0aecbe50b}” delay=”” img_link=”” el_class=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ top_margin=”-80″ column_shadow=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_color=”#e3e3e3″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”60″ bottom_padding=”90″ overlay_strength=”0.3″][vc_column centered_text=”true” column_padding=”padding-3-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Temporary Spur Stent System

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_color=”#8a84d6″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”light” text_align=”left” top_padding=”60″ bottom_padding=”60″ overlay_strength=”0.3″][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” width=”2/3″ tablet_text_alignment=”center” phone_text_alignment=”center” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1647636104222{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

QUESTIONS?
TALK TO A REFLOW CLINICAL PRO.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1578521369955{padding-bottom: 38px !important;}”]For more information, please send us your question or request today. A Reflow pro will get back to you.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”medium” button_style=”see-through-2″ hover_color_override=”#313131″ hover_text_color_override=”#ffffff” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”HOW MAY WE HELP” margin_bottom=”38″ url=”contact/”][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-4-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” width=”1/3″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”]
